work.title: Mobile Developer Intern
work.short_desc: Developed Android, iOS and Javascript application for a marketing company.
work.desc:
I developed mostly Android applications, but also some iOS and Javascript application for the clients of Loyalty Company, a marketing agency based in Lyon, France. I had the chance to be very autonomous, so I could choose myself the architecture of my projects.
 During this internship, I faced short deadlines, which is quit exciting as you have to work like in a Hackathon somtime. But what I've enjoyed the most was to have a global overview of the projects' process by talking a lot with the marketing project's managers and the technical managers.

work.title: System and software developer
work.short_desc: Migrate an existing set of applications to the Redhat Openshift platform
work.desc: My mission during this internship was to migrate an existing set of applications connected alltogether by a bus (Geoserver, admin panel, Rok4..) to the company's openshift server. I've done a lot of linux configuration, openshift cartriges creation and some java to prepare the applications to be used as a PaaS

work.title: Android developer
work.short_desc: Developed a Tinder like application for a junior enterprise's client
work.desc:
This was my first real android project, with a real client. I had to respect a precise design given by the client and also implements the famous Tinder card animation (there was no library at the time).
I also dove into the Android Facebook SDK as the application had a string integtration with Facebook.
